Does this have the Russian audio on the rear surround channels like the DD5.1 version?

Listened to this on headphones and it seemed like the russian audio was present in a few scenes. It's decent and if you can put up with it along with some russian text and no (full) subtitles, this can be an early x-mas present. However if you want a quality rip, you should probably wait until closer to blu-ray release (february 5)

Skipped to a few scenes and it all seems great. Will watch tonight and get back if any changes.
